headline: Could Medtronic’s (MDT) EMEA Digital Move Reveal a Broader Shift in Patient Data Strategy?
summary: On November 12, 2025, Minze Health announced a three-year agreement with Medtronic to commercialize the Minze Diary Pod across the EMEA region for patients with overactive bladder symptoms using Medtronic’s InterStim system. This collaboration adds a digital health solution to Medtronic’s SNM therapy pathway, aiming to improve patient data collection and clinical decision-making in urinary care. We’ll examine how integrating an automated bladder diary could influence Medtronic’s positioning...
